Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "+NIP is the central command used by coders and builders to create and modify nippers (CNPC's). The command is dynamically comprised of any number of NIP related functions. See Examples for an incomplete list of the base features."

"+nip dog \\"die\\"\\r\\n Disable the NPC dog's heartbeat thread.\\r\\n\\r\\n+nip dog \\"list\\"\\r\\n Display a list of NIP libraries, signals and hooks present in the NPC.\\r\\n\\r\\n+nip dog \\"live\\"\\r\\n Enable the NPC's heartbeat thread.\\r\\n\\r\\n+nip bartender \\"present add Game:stuff:beer\\"\\r\\n Add the woe object \ to the bartender NPC's list of present objects.\\r\\n\\r\\n+nip \\"set Game:nippers:dog\\"\\r\\n Turn the woe object \ from a regular object into a NIP object."
